Yadu Nand Babuji

I am a Programmer working at the Computation Institute, University of Chicago and Argonne National Lab. I work on a parallel scripting language called Swift.

I care deeply about the code I write and the systems I help build. Some of my projects are hosted on github.

I paint, mostly with watercolors and pastels, and I love sharing snaps of those. Here are albums of some of my older work

Star Trek and LessWrong have influenced me a great deal over that past year (2013) and you are bound to see references and parallel ideas in my writings.
